title: Battered By Civil War, South Sudan Falters Toward 3rd Birthday
teaser: South Sudan is approaching the third anniversary of its independence. For more on the world's newest country, its civil war and the resulting humanitarian crisis, Melissa Block talks with E.J. Hogendoorn, the deputy director of Africa for the International Crisis Group.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
